Detailed Description

Class for the CALICE Ahcal conditions information during the reconstruction.

renamed from CaliceConditions 2007/12/14 B.Lutz

Information is stored module wise

Author:
B. Lutz DESY
Date:
Sep 11 2006

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

CALICE::AhcConditions::AhcConditions ( int  moduleNr,
unsigned  moduleID,
int  calibStart,
int  calibWidth,
bool  calibEnable,
int  hold,
int  holdWidth,
int  multiplex,
int  vcalib,
int  verification,
int  sr[12] 
) [inline]

constructor, AhcConditions is initialized with the parameters given

Parameters:
moduleNr mdoule "stamp"
moduleID module ID of the module the hit is in, low byte gives upper or lower half, high byte gives module "stamp", used to find correct calibration
calibStart starting time of Tcalib signal in ticks
calibWidth duration of the Tcalib signal in ticks
calibEnable has Tcalib signal been sent at all?
hold starting time of the hold signal in ticks (6.25ns)
holdWidth duration of the hold signal in ticks (6.25ns)
multiplex number of multiplexed signals in the acquisition cycle
vcalib Vcalib value
verification shift register verification pattern
sr shift registers
